movies.title: P.R.O.F.S.
movies.plot: A clique of four young teachers at a high school looks critically at their colleagues. To avoid falling in the same routine, they bring new ideas into the school lessons and play little games and pranks in their spare time -- sometimes get even more childish than their pupils. When they get opposition from the other teachers, they play tricks to get rid of them.
movies.simplePlot: A clique of four young teachers at a high school looks critically at their colleagues. To avoid falling in the same routine, they bring new ideas into the school lessons and play little ...

biography.bio: Patrick Bruel was born on May 14, 1959 in Tlemcen, Oran, France as Patrick Benguigui. He is one of the most famous French singer and actor, known for Le prénom (2012), and Un secret (2007). He was married to writer Amanda Sthers from September 2004 to 2008 . They have two children Oscar and Leon.
biography.name: Patrick Bruel

biography.bio: Fabrice Luchini was born on November 1, 1951 in Paris, France as Robert Luchini. He is an actor and writer, known for Dans la maison (2012), Paris (2008) and Les femmes du 6e étage (2010).
biography.name: Fabrice Luchini

biography.bio: Christophe Bourseiller was born on September 27, 1957 in Paris, France as Christophe Gintzburger-Kinsbourg. He is an actor and writer, known for Une Femme Mariée (1964), A Mere Mortal (1991) and Pardon Mon Affaire (1976).
biography.name: Christophe Bourseiller

biography.bio: Laurent Gamelon was born on June 19, 1960 in Boulogne-Billancourt, Hauts-de-Seine, France. He is an actor and writer, known for Ruby & Quentin (2003), Confidences trop intimes (2004) and Le placard (2001).
biography.name: Laurent Gamelon

biography.bio: Etienne Draber is an actor, known for Diva (1981), Ridicule (1996) and Le bossu (1997).
biography.name: Etienne Draber

biography.bio: Martine Sarcey was born on September 28, 1928 in Paris, France. She is known for her work on L'équipier (2004), La porteuse de pain (1973) and Pardon Mon Affaire (1976). She died on June 11, 2010 in Paris.
biography.name: Martine Sarcey

biography.bio: Yolanda Jilot is an actress, known for J.F.K.: Reckless Youth (1993), Diving In (1990) and Warlock: The Armageddon (1993).
biography.name: Yolanda Jilot

biography.bio: Charlotte Julian was born on January 12, 1951 in Perpignan, Pyrénées-Orientales, France. She is an actress, known for La pension des surdoués (1980), Les sabots à bascule (1990) and P.R.O.F.S. (1985).
biography.name: Charlotte Julian

biography.bio: Guy Montagné was born on March 6, 1948. He is an actor, known for Le fantôme de la liberté (1974), Commissaire Moulin (1976) and Qu'est-ce qui fait craquer les filles... (1982). He is married to Terry Shane.
biography.name: Guy Montagné

biography.bio: Isabelle Mergault was born on May 11, 1958 in Paris, France. She is an actress and writer, known for Meilleur espoir féminin (2000), Aujourd'hui peut-être... (1991) and Je vous trouve très beau (2005).
biography.name: Isabelle Mergault

biography.bio: Chantal Neuwirth was born on December 11, 1948 in Paris, France. She is an actress, known for A Very Long Engagement (2004), The Double Life of Veronique (1991) and Madeline (1998).
biography.name: Chantal Neuwirth

biography.bio: Camille de Casabianca was born on October 31, 1960 in Paris, France. She is an actress and director, known for Le fabuleux destin de Madame Petlet (1995), Vive nous! (2000) and Un étrange voyage (1981). She has been married to Patrick Blossier since September 24, 1988. They have one child.
biography.name: Camille de Casabianca

biography.bio: Jean-René Gossart is an actor, known for Emmanuelle 6 (1988), Nord (1991) and Les jeux sont faits! (1998).
biography.name: Jean-René Gossart

biography.bio: Anne Fontaine was born on July 15, 1959 in Luxembourg as Anne Sibertin-Blanc. She is an actress and writer, known for Adore (2013), Coco Before Chanel (2009) and The Innocents (2016). She is married to Philippe Carcassonne. They have one child.
biography.name: Anne Fontaine

biography.bio: André Raffard is an actor, known for Les visiteurs (1993), P.R.O.F.S. (1985) and Le retour de Casanova (1992).
biography.name: André Raffard
